text: Kim Seung-hwan (, also transliterated Kim Sung-hwan, born 15 May 1960) is a South Korean equestrian. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Kim Seung-hwan
